name: Ranon's Memorandum
loreDescription: A memorandum that contains all the records of magic researched by Ranon, the Mage. However, a spell is cast to show different content every time it's opened, so one must disable the spell to read the real content.

skillDescription.base: Increases Speed of the caster by 1.0% when they attack. Can stack up to 10 times.
skillDescription.max: Increases Speed of the caster by 2.0% when they attack. Can stack up to 10 times.
